== How to write a collector name ==

Recommended to use the [http://kiki.huh.harvard.edu/databases/botanist_index.html HUH Index of botanists]

=== Full name (HUH) ===

 * Most recommended.
 * Provide as much detail as possible (do not shortform)

*More examples needed.*

Last name, First names, title.

|| Macklin, James Alexander ||
|| Macklin, James A. ||
|| Macklin, J.A. ||
|| M., J.A. ||
|| M. ||

=== Standard/label name (HUH) ===

|| J. A. Macklin ||
|| C. Linnaeus ||

== How to write teams ==

 * Separate with "|" or "; ".
 * Avoid "&" for separating the last author.

Last name1, First names1, title1; Last name2, First names2, title2
